short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search all your personal or private playlist in YT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Can web scrape all of your playlist from the library page and keep track of modifications to playlist (new playlist creation, deletion and video addition). Also enable to open playlists in current tab or new tab, and either autoplay first video of playlist or just open the playlist page.
